Universal Internet of Things

UIoT is a research project to create an universal, free, open-source and dynamic IoT architecture.


Watch our Video

Supporting big Ideas

We want to help each other, and that obviously includes you. We want you to discover the IoT world. For this purpose we offer a large set of great toolkits.

Get Involved

  • Devices

    UIoT offers a big set of daily life applications, to which you can quickly add your own devices with our great tools. Our device library contains all you need.

    Find Devices

  • Applications

    UIoT offers a big set of daily life applications to which you can quickly add your own devices. We have great tools to help you get started. Our device library contains all you need.

    Explore Applications

Discovering with You

UIoT team works with you and for you to create a new IoT concept. By collaborating with our partners, we maximize your interaction and experience with our smart networks.


Get Involved

Let's be smart

UIoT architecture was constructed by academic papers, many people contribute to improve, and evolve, UIoT to a whole new level. Get involved, contribute to UIoT. We endorse academic works. We do academic works.

UIoT Academics

O Tempo do Amanhã

Author: Pedro Tominaga

Hoje (10/11) choveu dentro do UIoT. Não se sabe como, mas, enquanto a água vertia fora do laboratório, o ar-condicionado começou a “chorar” sobre nossos queridos dispositivos. É visando evitar este (e outros problemas) que o UIoT School está construindo uma estação metereológica, que fornecerá os dados necessários para o sistema maximizar sua relação com o meio-ambiente. E a equipe formada por Vitor, Ryan e Naja está trabalhando nos sensores de temperatura, umidade, pressão e chuva, que será parte integrante da estação metereológica e fornecerá os mais essenciais dados para a compreensão e predição do clima.

See the full post by clicking here.
